rev.desc.rev.desc: Modified trap.exits to only call the recursion on exit scripts that are not contained in $accum.scr.list.
On panel add.to.accum.list, changed $delete.formats=true to val($delete.formats,4). For some reason, $delete.formats registers as a character string so the former expression didn't work.

descript.descript: Modified trap.exits to only call the recursion on exit scripts that are not contained in $accum.scr.list.
On panel add.to.accum.list, changed $delete.formats=true to val($delete.formats,4). For some reason, $delete.formats registers as a character string so the former expression didn't work.
